title: Musical instruments-can I sell them?
transcript: if you have musical instruments at your home you cannot sell them because the prophet saidat when Allah makes something forbidden he makes its price forbidden as well meaning that if you sell it the money you have is Haram money what you do with it simplest thing is to to to destroy it if you have a guitar if you have a a stide if you have keyboards if you have a piano dispose of it and uh uh um destroy it and throw it and Allah will reward you for that
